explains: adj. 奢侈的，豪华的；心满意足的，舒适的；辞藻华丽的

sentences.en: To enable rental increases, you have to have luxurious furnishings.
sentences.cn: 为能实现租金增长，你得有豪华的室内陈设。

sentences.en: A carpenter will build a luxurious model for about seventy-five dollars.
sentences.cn: 一个木匠将花费大概75美元建造一个豪华模型。

sentences.en: Ella lived in a nice, cozy, luxurious house one night and moved into the spacious castle the next day.
sentences.cn: 艾拉前一晚还住在一间漂亮、舒适且奢华的房子里，第二天就搬到了这个宽敞的城堡。
